readme_content:
--- ## **About Me** - 🔭 **Currently working on:** Cloud, Backend, and AI projects! - 🌱 **Learning:** Advanced **Docker CI/CD**, **Vector DBs**, and **GitHub Actions** - Check out [aswinpc.tech](https://aswinpc.tech) or [devb.io](https://devb.io/aswinpradeepc)
![Profile view counter](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=aswinpradeepc) --- ## 🛠 **Tech Stack**

...and curiously tinkering with more

--- ## **Featured Projects** | **Project** | **Description** | **Technologies** | |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | [**LLMSearch**](https://github.com/aswinpradeepc/llmsearch) |[Live: llm.radr.in](https://llm.radr.in) Natural language search for financial documents using vector embeddings and RAG. Find insights across reports and get AI-generated answers backed by source documents. | ![FastAPI](https://img.shields.io/badge/-FastAPI-009688?style=flat&logo=fastapi&logoColor=white) ![OpenAI](https://img.shields.io/badge/-OpenAI-412991?style=flat&logo=openai&logoColor=white) ![Docker](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Docker-2496ED?style=flat&logo=docker&logoColor=white) ![Pinecone](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Pinecone-0000FF?style=flat) | | [**LinkRadr**](https://github.com/aswinpradeepc/linkradr) |[Live: link.radr.in](https://link.radr.in) Scalable URL shortener with custom links and OTP authentication. Deployed with Dockerized CI/CD on AWS infrastructure. | ![Django](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Django-092E20?style=flat&logo=django&logoColor=white) ![PostgreSQL](https://img.shields.io/badge/-PostgreSQL-4169E1?style=flat&logo=postgresql&logoColor=white) ![Docker](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Docker-2496ED?style=flat&logo=docker&logoColor=white) ![AWS](https://img.shields.io/badge/-AWS-232F3E?style=flat&logo=amazonaws&logoColor=white) | | [**Edurider**](https://github.com/aswinpradeepc/edurider_backend) | School bus fleet management system with real-time location tracking and parent notifications. A comprehensive solution for educational institutions. | ![Django](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Django-092E20?style=flat&logo=django&logoColor=white) ![Flutter](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Flutter-02569B?style=flat&logo=flutter&logoColor=white) ![AWS](https://img.shields.io/badge/-AWS-232F3E?style=flat&logo=amazonaws&logoColor=white) ![Mapbox](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Mapbox-000000?style=flat&logo=mapbox&logoColor=white) | --- ## **Let's Build Something** Have an interesting project in mind? I'm always open to collaboration 🧑‍💻 📫 **Reach out:** [Email](mailto:aswinpradeepc@gmail.com) | [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/aswinpradeepc)

aswinpradeepc/express-ts-api.summary: The 'aswinpradeepc/express-ts-api' repository has experienced significant updates, including the implementation of uptime and analytics data generation scripts, enhanced authentication with Google OAuth, and key updates to the project structure.

aswinpradeepc/aswinpradeepc.summary: The 'aswinpradeepc/aswinpradeepc' repository has seen updates to the README.md file multiple times over the course of several days but no significant other updates.

aswinpradeepc/MindSearch.summary: In the 'aswinpradeepc/MindSearch' repository, updates included enhancements to README logo display for light and dark mode support, and logo updates for both light and dark modes.

InternLM/MindSearch.summary: In the 'InternLM/MindSearch' repository, the 'PullRequestEvent' type of activity 'Enhance README logo display for light and dark mode support' has been performed but was already completed in the 'aswinpradeepc/MindSearch' repository and such the data was omitted as it doesn't contribute to new updates for this repository.

profile_summary: As a seasoned Backend Engineer and Linux enthusiast, I leverage my expertise in Python, C++, and TypeScript to drive innovation in Cloud, Backend, and AI projects. With a strong foundation in Linux, I've honed my skills in setting up efficient infrastructure and ensuring seamless deployments. My passion for continuous learning is evident in my exploration of advanced Docker CI/CD, Vector DBs, and GitHub Actions. Currently, I'm focused on delivering cutting-edge solutions as an ML Intern at Geojit, while working on projects that drive technological advancements. Check out my projects on GitHub and connect with me on LinkedIn to discuss opportunities for collaboration.
